name: ScavengerHunt
0:
”Alexa, open scavenger hunt.”
”Alexa, launch scavenger hunt.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: scavenger hunt
des:
Have a fun scavenger hunt with Alexa!

Alexa will ask you to find five household items. You will have 30 seconds to find each item. 

If you find the item early, you can say, "Alexa, I found it." Or if you don't have the item, you can say, "Alexa, I give up." Otherwise you will have 30 seconds to find the item!

It will be a different scavenger hunt every time you play the game with lots of witty banter!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
